mapper.select: Select itemName From codeSet Where itemCode='${value}'

Select * From (Select rownum rna, a.* from ( Select rownum rn, tc.*, Decode(lt.gServNo,tc.gServNo,'1','0') heart, NVL(rv.cnt,0)rvCnt From v_tourcard tc, (Select count(*) cnt , gServno From review Where rStep = 0 Group by gServNo) rv, (Select * From likeit Where memberId = '${memberId}') lt Where tc.gServNo=lt.gServNo(+) and tc.gServNo=rv.gServNo(+) and ${endDate} and ${startDate} and (gServTitle LIKE '%${gservTitle}%' OR gServSub LIKE '%${gservSub}%' OR gServArea LIKE '%${gservArea}%' OR servTag LIKE '%${servTag}%' OR nickName LIKE '%${nickName}%' ) Order by ${order}, gServTitle ) a ) aa Where rna between ${start} and ${end}

Select * From (Select rownum rna, a.* from ( Select rownum rn, tc.*, Decode(lt.gServNo,tc.gServNo,'1','0') heart, NVL(rv.cnt,0)rvCnt From v_tourcard tc, (Select count(*) cnt , gServno From review Where rStep = 0 Group by gServNo) rv, (Select * From likeit Where memberId = '${memberId}') lt Where tc.gServNo=lt.gServNo(+) and tc.gServNo=rv.gServNo(+) and ${endDate} and ${startDate} and gServLeadTime ${gservLeadTime} and areaCode LIKE '${areaCode}%' and (servTag LIKE ${servTag}) and (gServDay LIKE ${gservDay}) and to_char(gServPrice) LIKE '${gservPrice}%' Order by ${order}, gServTitle ) a ) aa Where rna between ${start} and ${end}

Select * From (Select rownum rna, a.* from ( Select rownum rn, tc.*, Decode(lt.gServNo,tc.gServNo,'1','0') heart, NVL(rv.cnt,0)rvCnt From v_tourcard tc, (Select count(*) cnt , gServno From review Where rStep = 0 Group by gServNo) rv, (Select * From likeit Where memberId = '${memberId}') lt Where tc.gServNo=lt.gServNo(+) and tc.gServNo=rv.gServNo(+) and tc.gno = #{gno}
Order by gServTitle ) a ) aa where rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
Select * From ( Select rownum hotOrder, a.* From (select srch_title, count(*) cnt from searchRecord group by srch_title order by cnt desc ) a ) Where hotOrder between 1 and 10
